chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
I need to change the billing address of the bill
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile

Our customer opened a new request, because he wants a modification of the invoice for this order.

Could you please add the next information to the invoice?

✦ CIF (Company identification): B83658898

✦ Company name: Administraciones Arroyo SL

✦ Address: C/ Río Jarama 11 28924 Móstoles, Madrid

I appreciate your support.

Regards,
Linda from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

I have updated the invoice and attached it to this message. Do let me know if the customer still requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
